column2: Completely Retarded
Totemist
This character believes [Root.GetHerHis] religion spiritually bounds [Root.GetHerHim] with a particular animal - totem. Characters sharing a religious totem feel stronger connection with each other.
Ritualist

This character believes that worship of [Root.GetHerHis] Gods must be perfected through strict adherence to rituals and proper worship, as well as cultivation of self-discipline. The most Orthodox (contrast to Orthopractic) branch of [Root.Religion.GetName] faith.
Mischievous

This character sees [Root.GetHerHis] faith as Orthopractic, and therefore has chosen to model [Root.GetHerselfHimself] after intelligent and witty tricksters, such as, in many European cultures, the Fox.
Hardy
This character sees [Root.GetHerHis] faith as Orthopractic, and therefore has chosen to model [Root.GetHerselfHimself] after tough and brutish beasts, such as the Bear.
Egoist
This character holds a belief that [Root.GetHerHis] religion instructs [Root.GetHerHim] to pursue individual growth and personal gain.
Altruist
This character believes [Root.GetHerHis] religion dictates first and foremost care for people around [Root.GetHerHim] and encourages selfless lifestyle, similar to Wolves in packs.
I am interested in other branches...
I am interested in other branches...
Choosing a Branch
Upon delving deeper into religious studies, I have come with a greater understanding of [Root.Religion.GetName] and [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName].
Nothing matters more than family.
There is only one way to please the Gods.
These guidelines will help me develop a sharp mind.
I must study more...
Choosing a Branch

To have greater understanding of [Root.Religion.GetName], I have decided to Consult with Shamans and other Religious Scholars that seem to know more about [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] than how to communicate with their [Root.GetTitle] in a way that will let me understand at least half of what they are preaching about. Regardless, I have come to a final conclusion of my beliefs.
I now understand that I must achieve strength and fortitude.
Unlike Cross-Worshippers, my faith empowers an Individual.
I must seek to protect and strengthen my people.
[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] has granted us a guardian spirit.
